alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 03 at 2:56AM MDT until April 04 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Strongest wind gusts will occur along the I-84 corridor overnight through Tuesday morning. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Idaho. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow may also locally reduce visibility at times and cause dangerous driving conditions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley
